summary: One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.
cast: Rick Hearst|Gordon MacDonald|Jennifer Lowry|Theo Barnes|Lucille Saint-Peter|Vicki Darnell|Joseph Gonzalez|Bradlee Rhodes|Michael Bishop|Beverly Bonner|Ari M. Roussimoff|Michael Rubenstein|Angel Figueroa|John Reichert|Don Henenlotter|Kenneth Packard|Artemis Pizarro|Slam Wedgehouse|Kevin Van Hentenryck|Daniel Frye|John Zacherle
keywords: parasite|male objectification|two word title|body part in title|taking a shower
title: Brain Damage
